1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot: A young father is shot and killed while on a late-night walk with a friend in a Cincinnati neighborhood. Detective Jenny Luke is determined to find out if this was a set up or a random act of violence.

2.title: Episode #1.2
2.plot: When a drug deal leaves one man dead, and another paralyzed from the neck down, Detective Mitsch works diligently to find those responsible. Meanwhile, Detective Benton hunts for the person who murdered a business owner in front of his own home.

imdb.plot outline: In this honest look at life as a female detective in the male-dominated world of homicide investigation, hit the streets of Cincinnati and Atlanta with elite WOMEN OF HOMICIDE who work relentlessly to put killers behind bars. Comb through the evidence, interview suspects and witnesses, and follow the blood trail that may lead to the killer, or a dead end.
imdb.title: Women of Homicide
plot: In this honest look at life as a female detective in the male-dominated world of homicide investigation, hit the streets of Cincinnati and Atlanta with elite WOMEN OF HOMICIDE who work relentlessly to put killers behind bars. Comb through the evidence, interview suspects and witnesses, and follow the blood trail that may lead to the killer, or a dead end.
